main_definition: A nickname or term of endearment often used to refer to someone named Edward, especially in informal contexts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Informal name for a person with the first name Edward
A term of endearment used by parents or close family members to affectionately refer to their child named Edward
meanings_and_examples.example: I love you so much, Eddie. You're my little buddy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Historical nickname for a person from the 19th century known as 'The Great Edwin' (Edwin is an alternative form of Edward)
meanings_and_examples.example: Eddie, also known as The Great Edwin, was a renowned industrialist in his time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In certain dialects or regions, it may be used humorously to refer to someone with the name Edward
meanings_and_examples.example: When we were kids, Eddie and I always played pranks on each other because of our middle names starting with 'E'.
